data.title: Sriram Narayanan on LinkedIn: Nokia Language Model & Generative AI
data.meta_description: We all know the power of Large Language Models (LLMs) and many pre-trained models are commercially available. But when it comes to specific domains like‚Ä¶
data.text:
An engaging and insightful session on GenAI and its impact in Telco operations that was facilitated though via our "Learning with Leaders" webinar series. Thank you to our Bell Labs Consulting(BLC) colleagues who delivered an effective session based on BLC's insightful White Paper, the session covered the concept of generative AI and examined how it can affect various functions in a telco's business, from network design to customer care. Thank you to all who participated! You can catch the recording and also read the Bell Labs consulting white paper "Generative AI implications for telco operations" white paper here: https://lnkd.in/erym39aS Stay tuned for more in our "Learning with leaders" series from the Nokia Mobile Networks Learning Services team! #Nokia #GenAI #Telco #Innovation #Webinar #TechCollaboration #BellLabsConsulting #MobileNetworksLearningServices #FutureOfTelecom

We have all seen the challenges Network infrastructure owners face in obtaining accurate, easily accessible information to inform their infrastructure buildout decisions. That's why I'm excited to share Nokia's Digital Site Twin Solution. This game changing solution combines precision and user-friendliness, and empowers you to optimize your assets and make smarter investment choices. All the while reducing repeat site visits and the exposure of field teams to high risk activities. It‚Äôs inspiring to see technology that empowers and brings strong benefits in so many dimensions. If you want to learn more about Nokia‚Äôs Digital Site Twins, check out my blog here: https://nokia.ly/3ww5Lif I look forward to connecting with you to discuss how digital services can shape the future of your radio access networks! #ai #automation #digitalsitetwin

ü§ñ Since the launch of Open AI's ChatGPT, generative AI has become a buzzword. But what actual implications does this technology have on industries like telco operations? From customer care to network design, Bell Labs Consulting's new paper examines generative AI and how it can affect various telco business functions. Read it here ‚û°Ô∏è https://nokia.ly/3vT1e9m #AI #BellLabsConsulting

ü§ñ Generative AI is seemingly the topic of the year, expanding beyond the world of technology and into almost every industry, even telecommunications. But what does this mean for optimizing operations and transformation for telcos? Learn more via Bell Labs Consulting's latest Quick Take... Check it out ‚û°Ô∏è https://nokia.ly/3tvOYKB #AI #ArtificialIntelligence
